>        On to further business.  Airly has offered to help develop 
a new site 
> as long as other members help with the development and upkeep.  I 
do not have 
> the time right now to help in any significant way (AP tests and 
end of year 
> stuff, etc.) so we need volunteers.

Wish me good luck and I will do my best.

>        Now for my final piece of business.  I've thought long and 
hard about 
> this... At the end of June I'm going to step down from ownership 
of the 
> list...  I'll be gone through most of July and between work in the 
summer and 
> starting college in the fall... I don't have the time to give that 
this group 
> deserves.  I don't intend to leave the group as the past owners 
have but I 
> will need to step back my involvement a bit.  I haven't yet 
decided who will 
> replace me... I have a few ideas but I need to check with them 
first.  I 
> wasn't planning on announcing it this soon but I thought giving 
the group 
> time to prepare for the change would be better than me just fading 
out.
> 
>        Alright I'm sorry I was so longwinded today.  Back to your 
game.


I hope that you stay with us  a long time more
